resources.string: Welcome to LaundryRie, please enter the weight of the clothes and how many days you want to wash them, please fill in:
Hello, welcome to Laundry Rie. This application makes it easy for you to share with buyers so they don\'t forget their laundry
Hi, let me introduce myself, Togi Samuel Simarmata, I\'m from class D3IF 46-03. Here I made an application for Laundry which can be applied to Laundry Shop Copyright Â© 2024, All rights reserved.
LaundryRie Notification: Clothes Weight: %1$s Kg %2$s Days If you haven\'t paid yet, this is your payment price Rp.%3$.2f and you can pick it up on the day you have been notified.
There are no Laundry records yet
Name, weight of clothes and day must be filled in!
